title: All she wants for Christmas is a Big Mac? McDonald's and Mariah Carey pair up for a holiday menu
text:
The “All I Want for Christmas” singer is the latest celebrity to collaborate with McDonald's Corp. MCD on a limited-time special menu.

Announced on Twitter, McDonald's will make daily deals available on its app from Dec. 13 through Dec. 24.

McDonald's has partnered with musical names through its Famous Orders program, which has brought meal deals tied to acts like BTS, Saweetie and J Balvin to customers.

https://twitter.com/McDonalds/status/1458454085326282757A number of other quick-service chains have gotten on board the musical collaboration bandwagon, with Lil Nas X working with Yum Brands Inc.'s YUM Taco Bell chain, Starbucks Corp. SBUX teaming up with Chance the Rapper for a TikTok challenge and Jack in the Box Inc. JACK creating a virtual restaurant with Uber Eats UBER and Jason Derulo.

The Tim Hortons chain also announced on Twitter Wednesday that it has partnered with Justin Bieber on new flavors for the company's Timbit product, launching Nov. 29.

Tim Hortons is part of the Restaurant Brands International Inc. QSR portfolio.

https://twitter.com/TimHortons/status/1458449373709299717McDonald's shares have gained 18% for the year to date. Restaurant Brands stock has fallen 5.6% for the period. And the benchmark Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA has run up 18% for 2021 so far.
